TunableTuple.name: ROUTING_DATA
TunableTuple.description: Display Name and icon that will be displayed in the posture area in the interaction queue while an interaction is transitioning.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon to display in posture slot in UI while interaction is transitioning.

Tunable.name: routing_name
Tunable.description: Display name for icon when routing icon appears in posture slot of UI
